function NPC_8897000:Init( NPCID ) --[[ 1 : Damage Acc for forced landing 2 : Damage Acc for Wakeup 3 : Damage Acc for Break Head 4 : Damage Acc for Break Tail --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 4 )
NPC_8897000.BufIdAttrFire = 40720 NPC_8897000.BufIdAttrCold = 40722
NPC_8897000.TimerIDShortFlying = 2 -- 단기 비행모드 NPC_8897000.TimerIDLongFlying = 3 -- 장기 비행모드 NPC_8897000.TimerIDHighFlying = 4 -- 장기 비행모드
NPC_8897000.DurationShortFlying = 20 NPC_8897000.DurationLongFlying = 45 NPC_8897000.DurationHighFlying = 15
NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode0 = 251100032 NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode1 = 251100033 NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode4 = 251100034
NPC_8897000.TalIdHighFlyingLanding = 251100056
NPC_8897000.LimitPerForLongTermFlying = 0.9 NPC_8897000.LimitPerForIceMode = 0.6 NPC_8897000.LimitForPain = NPC_8897000.MaxHP/20 NPC_8897000.LimitForWakeUp = 3000 NPC_8897000.LimitForBreakHead = NPC_8897000.MaxHP/20
NPC_8897000.DataIdxForPain = 1 NPC_8897000.DataIdxForWakeUp = 2 NPC_8897000.DataIdxForBreakHead = 3
NPC_8897000.PartsIdxForHead = 3 NPC_8897000.PartsIdxForTail = 1
NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode0 = 251100035 NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode1 = 251100036 NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode4 = 251100030
NPC_8897000.TalIdWakeUp = 251100031 NPC_8897000.TalIdBreakHead = 251100004 NPC_8897000.TalIdForLanding = 251100054
NPC_8897000.TalIdBPartAttack = 197001
NPC_8897000.PartIdxForHead = 3
end
function NPC_8897000:OnSpawn( Info ) this:GainBuff( NPC_8897000.BufIdAttrFire ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnTimer( TimerID ) GLog( "OnTimer" .. TimerID .. "\n" ) if TimerID == 60 then if this:GetHP() <= NPC_8897000.MaxHP * 0.6 then this:GainBuff( 100101 ) this:KillTimer( 60 ) this:SetTimer( 50, 1, true ) end elseif TimerID == 50 then if this:GetHP() <= NPC_8897000.MaxHP * 0.5 then this:GainBuff( 100102 ) this:KillTimer( 50 ) this:SetTimer( 40, 1, true ) elseif not this:CheckBuff( 100101 ) then this:GainBuff( 100101 ) end elseif TimerID == 40 then if this:GetHP() <= NPC_8897000.MaxHP * 0.4 then this:GainBuff( 100103 ) this:KillTimer( 40 ) this:SetTimer( 30, 1, true ) elseif not this:CheckBuff( 100102 ) then this:GainBuff( 100102 ) end elseif TimerID == 30 then this:GainBuff( 100104 ) if this:GetHP() <= NPC_8897000.MaxHP * 0.3 then this:GainBuff( 100104 ) this:KillTimer( 30 ) this:SetTimer( 20, 1, true ) elseif not this:CheckBuff( 100103 ) then this:GainBuff( 100103 ) end elseif TimerID == 20 then if this:GetHP() <= NPC_8897000.MaxHP * 0.2 then this:GainBuff( 100105 ) this:KillTimer( 20 ) this:SetTimer( 10, 1, true ) elseif not this:CheckBuff( 100104 ) then this:GainBuff( 100104 ) end elseif TimerID == 10 then if this:GetHP() <= NPC_8897000.MaxHP * 0.1 then this:GainBuff( 100106 ) --this:KillTimer( 10 ) elseif not this:CheckBuff( 100105 ) then this:GainBuff( 100105 ) end end
if TimerID == NPC_8897000.TimerIDShortFlying or TimerID == NPC_8897000.TimerIDLongFlying then if this:GetMode() == 2 then local Enemy = this:Aggro( "short", -1 ) this:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode0 ) this:UseTalent( NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode0, Enemy ) elseif this:GetMode() == 3 then local Enemy = this:Aggro( "short", -1 ) this:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode1 ) this:UseTalent( NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode1, Enemy ) elseif this:GetMode() == 5 then local Enemy = this:Aggro( "short", -1 ) this:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode4 ) this:UseTalent( NPC_8897000.TalIdSliding_ToMode4, Enemy ) elseif this:GetMode() == 6 then --ThisNPC:SetTimer( TimerID, 6, false ) end
return end
if TimerID == NPC_8897000.TimerIDHighFlying then --GLog( "HighFlyingLanding" .. "\n" ) this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8897000.TalIdHighFlyingLanding ) end end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishSlidingAttack( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:KillTimer( NPC_8897000.TimerIDShortFlying ) ThisNPC:KillTimer( NPC_8897000.TimerIDLongFlying ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishAndAggroRandom( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
--[[ FlyingMode진입시 착지를 위한 타이머id및 시간을 설정해 준다. --]] function NPC_8897000:OnStartFlying( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local HpPer = ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() if HpPer > NPC_8897000.LimitPerForLongTermFlying then ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_8897000.TimerIDShortFlying, NPC_8897000.DurationShortFlying, false ) --[[ elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 5 then --]] else ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_8897000.TimerIDLongFlying, NPC_8897000.DurationLongFlying, false ) end end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange0_2( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange0_2\n" ) NPC_8897000:OnStartFlying( ThisActor, Enemy ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange1_3( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange1_3\n" ) NPC_8897000:OnStartFlying( ThisActor, Enemy ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange0_1( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange0_1\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8897000.BufIdAttrCold ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange1_4( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange1_4\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8897000.BufIdAttrFire ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange1_5( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange1_5\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8897000.BufIdAttrFire ) NPC_8897000:OnStartFlying( ThisActor, Enemy ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange4_5( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange4_5\n" ) NPC_8897000:OnStartFlying( ThisActor, Enemy ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange5_6( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange5_6\n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_8897000.TimerIDHighFlying, NPC_8897000.DurationHighFlying, false ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnFinishModeChange6_5( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnFinishModeChange6_5\n" ) end
function NPC_8897000:ChkForWakeUp( ThisNPC ) local TalIdCur = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() --GLog( " NPC_8897000:ChkForWakeUp " .. TalIdCur .. "\n" ) return TalIdCur == NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode0 or TalIdCur == NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode1 or TalIdCur == NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode4 end
function NPC_8897000:ChkForBreakHead( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) return PartsIdx == NPC_8897000.PartsIdxForHead and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_8897000.PartIdxForHead ) and ( ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 or ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 ) and not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8897000.TalIdBreakHead ) end
function NPC_8897000:ChkForPain( ThisNPC ) return ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() ~= NPC_8897000.TalIdForLanding and not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8897000.TalIdPain ) end
function NPC_8897000:AccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) --GLog( " AccDamage( HitInfo.Damage ) : " .. HitInfo.Damage .. "\n" )
local AccDamage
-- Wake Up pattern if NPC_8897000:ChkForWakeUp( ThisNPC ) then AccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForWakeUp ) + HitInfo.Damage --GLog( " AccDamage( " .. NPC_8897000.DataIdxForWakeUp .. " ) : " .. AccDamage .. "\n" )
if AccDamage > NPC_8897000.LimitForWakeUp then ThisNPC:ClearJob(); ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8897000.TalIdWakeUp ); ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForWakeUp, 0 )
return HitInfo end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForWakeUp, AccDamage )
return HitInfo end
-- ChkForBreakHead if NPC_8897000:ChkForBreakHead( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) then AccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForBreakHead ) + HitInfo.Damage
--GLog( " AccDamage(" .. NPC_8897000.DataIdxForBreakHead .. ") : " .. AccDamage .. "\n" ) if AccDamage > NPC_8897000.LimitForBreakHead then ThisNPC:ClearJob(); ThisNPC:BreakPart( NPC_8897000.PartIdxForHead, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8897000.TalIdBreakHead ); ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForBreakHead, 0 )
return HitInfo end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForBreakHead, AccDamage )
return HitInfo end
-- Pain Pattern if NPC_8897000:ChkForPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) then if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 2 then NPC_8897000:ProcessPainPattern( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo, NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode0 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 3 then NPC_8897000:ProcessPainPattern( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo, NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode1 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 5 then NPC_8897000:ProcessPainPattern( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo, NPC_8897000.TalIdPain_ToMode4 ) elseif HitInfo.TalentID == NPC_8897000.TalIdBPartAttack and not ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() ~= NPC_8897000.TalIdBreakHead then ThisNPC:ClearJob(); ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8897000.TalIdBreakHead ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForPain, 0 ) end
return HitInfo end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_8897000:ProcessPainPattern( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo, TalIdPain ) local AccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForPain ) + HitInfo.Damage --GLog( " AccDamage(" .. NPC_8897000.DataIdxForPain .. ") : " .. AccDamage .. "\n" ) if AccDamage > NPC_8897000.LimitForPain or HitInfo.TalentID == NPC_8897000.TalIdBPartAttack then
ThisNPC:ClearJob(); ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( TalIdPain ); ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForPain, 0 ) return end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_8897000.DataIdxForPain, AccDamage ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_8897000:AccDamage( this, 0, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnHitCapsule_1_1( HitInfo ) return NPC_8897000:AccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnHitCapsule_2_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_8897000:AccDamage( this, 0, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8897000:OnHitCapsule_2_1( HitInfo ) return NPC_8897000:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8897000:Doping( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( 60, 5, true ) end
